hasDitaContent.@value: Voriconazole is predicted to increase the exposure to zopiclone. Manufacturer advises adjust dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Voriconazole   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   zopiclone .  Manufacturer advises adjust dose .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both zopiclone and zolpidem can have CNS depressant effects, which might affect the ability to perform skilled tasks (see 'Drugs and Driving' in Guidance on Prescribing).

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  zopiclone  and  zolpidem  can have CNS depressant effects, which might affect the ability to perform skilled tasks (see 'Drugs and Driving' in  Guidance on Prescribing ).

hasDitaContent.@value: Both zopiclone and zuclopenthixol can have CNS depressant effects, which might affect the ability to perform skilled tasks (see 'Drugs and Driving' in Guidance on Prescribing).

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  zopiclone  and  zuclopenthixol  can have CNS depressant effects, which might affect the ability to perform skilled tasks (see 'Drugs and Driving' in  Guidance on Prescribing ).
